sentences.sentence: Jo Beall, British Council director of education and society, said the fall would cause alarm among UK vice-chancellors.
sentences.translation: 英国教育与社会委员会主任乔·北奥说，数值的下降会引起英国大学副行政主管的惊恐。

sentences.sentence: He will always be remembered as one of the great Chancellors of the Exchequer.
sentences.translation: 作为最伟大的财政大臣之一他将永远被铭记。

sentences.sentence: The opposition leader spoke against the chancellors' proposals and made mincemeat of them.
sentences.translation: 反对派领导人反对大臣们的建议，并将他们驳得体无完肤。
